title: Prison Services
details: Children living with their mothers in prison face numerous challenges, including a lack of social support from extended family and friends, as well as isolation from their communities. To address the unique needs of these vulnerable children, KCCBSSA has assigned dedicated staff to provide essential services. This includes preparing nutritious meals for the children and offering preschool-like educational support to help them cope with their circumstances.
two_detail: By creating a nurturing environment, KCCBSSA aims to comfort and support these children, ensuring they receive the care and attention they need during a difficult time. Our commitment to their well-being is a crucial aspect of our broader mission to advocate for the rights and needs of all children, regardless of their circumstances.
